original_title: La Dame dans l'auto avec des lunettes et un fusil
overview: She’s the most beautiful, most short-sighted, most sentimental, most perplexing, most obstinate, most untrustworthy and most troubling of heroines. The lady in the car has never seen the sea. On the run from the police, she keeps telling herself that she’s not crazy… Only...
title: The Lady in the Car with Glasses and a Gun
